function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of effective control methods for tsetse flies","Impact":"Increase in the density of tsetse flies, leading to higher transmission of human African trypanosomiasis (HAT)","Mitigation":"Implementation of cost-effective methods like 'Tiny Targets' for controlling riverine species of tsetse","Technologies":"Tiny Targets for reducing the density of tsetse flies","People":"Populations living in regions with tsetse flies","Owner":"Control programs and health authorities"},{"Description":"Relaxation of disease control programs in non-endemic regions","Impact":"Potential resurgence of vector-borne diseases like malaria, West Nile virus, dengue, and Zika","Mitigation":"Continued mosquito control and environmental management programs","Technologies":"Mosquito abatement, larviciding, and environmental management","People":"Populations in non-endemic regions","Owner":"Mosquito abatement districts and health authorities"}]}
